column4: Would an AMD X3 be "Intel compatible" as it says on the second part of this page for the bootable cdrom? http://seagate.custkb.com/seagate/crm/selfservice/search.jsp?DocId=207957
I would be very surprised if an AMD processor isn't intel compatible enough to reflash a hard drive
ouch..  that's a lot of data =/

Not even done yet, that is partial, I have another 500gig or so to put back still.  Had to move everything off, then back after destroying it when I moved from an old server to a newer one because a drive kept dropping out, guess it was this same issue though, the one that the firmware upgrade claims to fix.
